attributes.action: Make sure all people are c r b checked when they work at sites where children will be visiting
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To make sure all companies crb check all people who work at the site paid or un paid to have a crb check done even if on their job description it is said that they are allways supervised with children it takes less than a minute for a child to be assaulted in the form of touching,
